outcomes.description: You help the baby bird back to its nest. The mother bird chirps gratefully.

choices.text: Check the nest for more eggs

outcomes.description: You find another egg in the nest. You carefully tuck it under the mother bird.
You offer some nuts to the hedgehog.

choices.text: The hedgehog is delighted and gives you a shiny pebble.
The hedgehog thanks you and scurries off happily.

outcomes.description: The beaver asks if you have a stick to help with the dam.

choices.text: Give the beaver a stick (if you have one)
Apologize and watch the beaver work

give_stick.failMessage: You don't have a stick to give the beaver. Maybe you can find one in the forest.helpe

outcomes.description: You give the beaver a stick. The beaver is thrilled and invites you to visit anytime.
You watch the beaver work. It's impressive!
